Serialized Form

  • Package arimaa.gui

    • Class arimaa.gui.GameControlsPanel

      class GameControlsPanel extends JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • computerMoveButton
          JButton computerMoveButton
          Button to make a random move (when it's computer's turn in a single-player)
        • finishedButton
          JButton finishedButton
          Button to indicate that you're finished with your turn and do not wish to make more moves
        • game
          Game game
          Game currently acted on by the Game Controls Panel
        • gameClock
          GameClock gameClock
          Game clock on a separate thread to track decision times
        • gameControlsGroup
          JPanel gameControlsGroup
        • labeledBoardPanel
          arimaa.gui.LabeledBoardPanel labeledBoardPanel
          Labeled Board Panel displaying the game state
        • movesLeftTextPanel
          JLabel movesLeftTextPanel
          Label indicating how many moves are left this turn
        • noneButton
          JRadioButton noneButton
          Button to set the board panel to none mode
        • playerBottomTime
          JLabel playerBottomTime
          Label with the first/golden/yellow player time
        • playerTopTime
          JLabel playerTopTime
          Label with the second/silver/blue player time
        • pullButton
          JRadioButton pullButton
          Button to set the board panel to pull mode
        • pushButton
          JRadioButton pushButton
          Button to set the board panel to push mode
        • resignButton
          JButton resignButton
          Button to resign and make the opponent the winner
        • saveButton
          JButton saveButton
          Button to generate game log (which can be later loaded for history viewing or continuous game)
        • stepButton
          JRadioButton stepButton
          Button to set the board panel to step mode
        • switchButton
          JRadioButton switchButton
          Button to set the board panel to switch mode
        • turnIndicatorTextPanel
          JLabel turnIndicatorTextPanel
          Label indicating whose turn it is

    • Class arimaa.gui.HistoryPanel

      class HistoryPanel extends JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • currentEnd
          int currentEnd
          Instance variable: ending index of the currently highlighted area of the current step
        • currentStart
          int currentStart
          Instance variable: starting index of the currently highlighted area of the current step
        • direction
          boolean direction
          Direction variable used to catch when user changes direction of reading.
        • greenHighlighter
          Highlighter.HighlightPainter greenHighlighter
          Green highlighter for next moves.
        • labeledBoardPanel
          arimaa.gui.LabeledBoardPanel labeledBoardPanel
          BoardPanel enhanced with row/column labels enabling panel-board communication
        • longText
          JTextArea longText
          JTextArea to be filled with game history text.
        • redHighlighter
          Highlighter.HighlightPainter redHighlighter
          Red highlighter for previous (inverse) moves
